question: In 1976, which gymnast scored 7 maximum scores of 10 as she won three gold medals, one silver and one bronze?
api_result: In 1976, the gymnast who scored 7 perfect scores of 10 and won three gold medals, one silver, and one bronze was Nadia Comaneci from Romania. She achieved this remarkable feat at the Montreal Olympics, becoming the first gymnast in Olympic history to score a perfect 10.
